Bay Colony Golf Club membership is about celebrating life with a remarkable collection of extraordinary individuals who share similar values, beliefs, lifestyles, accomplishments and experiences. The Club and the course are without equal, but it is the people that make Bay Colony Golf Club special. HTML Generator Untitled Basic Web Content Why Members Choose Us Bay Colony Golf Club membership offers an exclusive ingredient to an extraordinary life — a club of like-minded individuals with similar goals, passions, accomplishments, values, and visions. We stand alone because not only are we a club offering renowned world-class dining, lively social events, superb golf experiences, and vigilant and caring staff, but our members also continuously celebrate one another and form unparalleled and meaningful friendships. They weave together their passions, families, and lives to create a uniquely intimate community where everyone knows your name. If you’re searching for a one-of-a-kind community that’s built on uplifting other individuals from all over the world, you’ve found your place. View Brochure Brochure Content Phenomenal dining and dynamic social experiences are cherries on top of what we are best known for — enriching our members’ lives with extraordinary experiences! We know that where you choose to spend your precious time needs to be somewhere spectacular and truly worthy, and that’s why we have cultivated an exceptional group of compatible individuals who choose to share and create some of the best memories of their lives. Here at the Club, we are family. Everyone has a permanent spot at the table — a table that also provides out-of-this-world dining and unsurpassed companionship. It’s where members share meals and laughs as well as bring their families to partake in the revelry. At Bay Colony Golf Club, you’re not just one of the masses, like at many larger clubs. Our attentive team ensures that all of your needs are met with highly personalized service. We are your second home year-round, and we are here to provide you with unmatched dining, golf, and adventures with individuals who you choose to let into your intimate circle. Membership Opportunities Membership Opportunities Experience the Best of Naples When available, we offer Equity Golf Memberships, a luxury many clubs no longer afford. Ideal for those wanting to spend their days unwinding on a lush green course and end them gazing at stunning Naples sunsets, sipping on exquisite cocktails, and enjoying delectable dining. While many Clubs are no longer offering equity, Bay Colony Golf Club leads the the field in luxury, stature, and value. Read More Membership Testimonials Testimonials “From the first time I set foot on Bay Colony Golf Club property I knew it was a very special place….” - J. Abruzzese, Member since 2010 “We felt wanted and welcomed. Members stopped to introduce themselves to us and the staff knew our names....we are so happy that we joined when we did!” - B. Maher, Member since 2014 “Joining Bay Colony Golf Club was one of the best decisions we've ever made.” - F. Moosally, Member since 2013 “I'm on the board of a club up north, belong to a club out east, but Bay Colony Golf Club is off the charts! Best club of all. I love the people here.” - J. Scaminace, Member since 2009 “A very memorable experience... every aspect of service is amazing. The course is in pristine shape...spectacular food and beverage...What a wonderful club to be associated with.” - S. Hamilton, Member since 2013 “I belong to multiple clubs from Colorado to North Carolina, but there is nothing like Bay Colony Golf Club, it is the best. It's the food, the service, the people. The members of this club are amazing. The best out of anywhere.” - K. Lewis, Member since 2011 “Joining Bay Colony Golf Club changed my life!” - G. Franks, Member since 2003 membership contact information For Membership Opportunities Contact Us Tammy Mercer Director of Membership & Marketing 239-449-4564 [email protected] Gallery Tiles Membership Click below to open gallery Click here Dining & Social Click below to open gallery Click here Golf Click below to open gallery Click here The Community Click below to open gallery Click here

Head west on Immokalee Road to US 41 / Tamiami Trail. Turn left (South) on US 41. Take US 41 to Pelican Marsh Blvd./99th Avenue North. There is a traffic light at the intersection. Turn left onto Pelican Marsh Blvd. enter through the guarded gatehouse of Pelican Marsh. The Estates at Bay Colony Golf Club is the first private gated community on the left. Turn left and arrive at the Bay Colony guarded gatehouse. After you pass through the Estates at Bay Colony Golf Club guarded gate, follow Brassie Bend to Bent Grass Bend. Turn left onto Bent Grass Bend. Bay Colony Golf Club is immediately on the left. You have arrived. cke_bookmark_220S cke_bookmark_220E Untitled Basic Web Content Request for Information Form Designer DummyValue Request for Information Name: Email Interested In... --Select-- Membership Information Golf Shop Private Events Club Administration --Select-- Membership Information Golf Shop Private Events Club Administration Comments Submit

Bay Colony Golf Club has successfully managed to maintain a full complement of our maximum 300 Golf Members for over a decade. Currently, B ay Colony Golf Club is offering Equity Golf Memberships without residency restrictions based on availability. Golf Membership includes both spouses and any family members under the age of 23 living at home. While many Clubs are no longer offering equity, Bay Colony Golf Club leads the the field in luxury, stature, and value. 50 Social Memberships Memorable dining is what keeps them coming back for more. Social Membership allows a member to enjoy use of all dining venues, unlimited participation in Naples' liveliest social calendar, in-home custom catering, carry out service and unlimited summer golf. Only 50 Social Members are permitted at this time and membership is based on availability. Discover the extraordinary lifestyle at Bay Colony Golf Club Allow us introduce you to the exquisite Bay Colony Golf Club lifestyle. Please contact me for membership details or to arrange your personalized visit to the Club. Tammy Mercer Contact Information Contact Tammy Mercer, Director of Marketing & Membership Sales 239-449-4564 or [email protected]
